content.raw:
I think the short range laser is not positioned correctly. Here is the output from the topic viewer when using `X2_SENSOR_CONFIG_1=1 roslaunch subt_example team.launch`. It looks like the laser is positioned inside a collision element.

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/1056802813-short_range_laser.png)
content.html: I think the short range laser is not positioned correctly. Here is the output from the topic viewer when using X2_SENSOR_CONFIG_1=1 roslaunch subt_example team.launch. It looks like the laser is positioned inside a collision element.
